Keywords: Detective , Generation X , Horsemen , Police , X-Men
Real Name: Sean Cassidy
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. When Banshee makes a range attack, you may replace a die in the attack roll with the RALLY die. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls.)
Figure Errata
OLD: Opposing Attack Rolls. When Banshee uses Penetrating/Psychic Blast you may replace a die in the attack roll with the RALLY die. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls.)

Comments
August 11, 2021
Goop
Nothing amazing here. 75pt psyblast with ESD. Strong attack values all the way down and a guaranteed hit with a rally die. Very nice but 75pts is a lot and seems bit over costed when compared to other figs in this set.
June 13, 2021
pokolo
while not a great representation of the character, i think he will be solid in sealed and as a secondary attacker to your heavy hitter/tentpole.
June 11, 2021
toomanybatmans
It's not a great design. Banshee not only can shatter things with his voice he can also use his flight powers to enhance the impact of his sonic attacks. It's a very plain dial and we've had better in the past few years/
